https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rWan0yGCyDHTTiryO20woOvVyfh.jpg Terako is a young woman without a job. She has an affair with Iwanaga who is married. His wife is in a coma. One day, Terako's friend kills herself. After that, Terako sleeps all day long and wakes up only when Iwanaga calls her. Asleep
